channel.title: [PI] Easy Error

item.title: [PI] Easy Error
item.dc:creator: @KrypitcRc KrypitcRc
item.description:
@KrypitcRc wrote:

if (MYSQL.checkVotes(playerName)) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 2) { { if (MYSQL.voteGiven(playerName)) {c.getItems().addItem(995,10000000); c.sendMessage("Thank you for voting!Please vote again in 24 hours!"); } } else if (c.getItems().freeSlots() < 2) { c.sendMessage("You do not have enough free space to receive items."); } }

Should probably work.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Easy Error
item.dc:creator: @Football1smylife Football1smylife
item.description:
@Football1smylife wrote:

You are right I just realized that. Fixed it and now I got this. Edited the first post.

[quote=“Football1smylife, post:1, topic:379198”]This is the error:

src\server\model\players\Client.java:1056: 'else' without 'if' } else { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Can someone help me with this error real quick? It doesn’t seem too hard, but I have been trying to fix it now for about 45 minutes.

if (MYSQL.checkVotes(playerName)) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 2) { { if (MYSQL.voteGiven(playerName)) { c.getItems().addItem(995,10000000); c.sendMessage("Thank you for voting!Please vote again in 24 hours!"); } } else { } c.sendMessage("You do not have enough free space to receive items."); } }[/quote]

Read full topic
